Global Summary of the Day (NCDC DSI-9618). These values are derived from hourly synoptic reports exchanged on the Global Telecommunications System (GTS). Daily values derived in this fashion may differ significantly from "true" daily data, particularly for precipitation  (i.e., use with caution).
